Vol. I written by John Norris, M.A., Rector of Bemerton near Sarum ; to which are added, Reflections upon a late Essay concerning human understanding ; with a reply to the remarks made upon them by the Athenian Society.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Christian blessedness, or, Discourses upon the Beatitudes.

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
